name: Little Flappy Pony
description:
In this cute flappy pony game you need to help little pony to collect crystal hearts. Be careful because you have to avoid tree-trunks otherwise little pony will fall. Tap on your device to make little pony fly, get the hearts to level up and beat your friends high score!

Don't let little pony fall or hit the tree-trunks - tap the screen to flap the wings and stay in the air!

Break your own records in Game center and get the highest score!

It's a great flappy skill game which will test your reflexes and your patience – you will have to play many times to get higher and higher score.

Very cute and addictive flappy ponygame for ponies, unicorns and pegasus fans!

Features:
- easy to control
- nice background music
- cute little pony with wings
- high score and Game Centre
